products.name: Adibou
products.description: Adibou is a video game series created by Coktel Vision. It is intended for children aged 4 to 8 years. The series is named after its main character, Adibou, a small child.

products.name: Chilly's water bottle
products.description: Chilly's water bottles are reusable water bottles that can keep your drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot for up to 12 hours.
